name: Big Bash Boom
description: Big Bash Boom mixes all the big hitting thrills of T20 cricket with instantly accessible arcade action. Fully licensed and includes all teams and players featured in this year’s KFC Big Bash League (BBL) and Rebel Women’s Big Bash League (WBBL).
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (x64) or higher Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 / AMD Athlon II X4 555 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 6670 or NVIDIA Geforce GT710 with Min 2GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 9 GB available space Additional Notes: Controller Required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (x64) or higher Processor: Intel Core i5-4200 / AMD Phenom II X4 970 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 390X or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 with minimum 2GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 9 GB available space Additional Notes: Controller Required
